 [Government](https://www.cityofsalem.net/government) 

#  City Council & Mayor 

The Salem City Council is made up of eight City Councilors, each elected to represent one of Salem’s wards, and the Mayor, who is elected by voters throughout the City. They are volunteers who study city issues, solve problems, and take advantage of the opportunities facing local government.

## Meet Your Mayor & City Council

 CC:Media, in partnership with the City of Salem, created these videos so that you could hear Salem's Mayor and City Councilors describe in their own words their hopes for our community and their reasons for serving. 

  ![2025 Mayor - Council JHOY Tigan Nishioka Matthews Gwynn Brown Nordyke Varney](images/1a6d8f2af550ded437b2467ef1dcde1692d52ec8413c477b5c5a9fa4f03cd507.jpg)  

 *  [Mayor Julie Hoy](https://youtu.be/ZHiP_gEeiGk) 
 *  [Councilor Paul Tigan, Ward 1](https://youtu.be/AaAunQxQ5sw?si=Trqjjas1FKWw9GWp) 
 *  [Councilor Linda Nishioka, Ward 2](https://youtu.be/x5W__5UgaYg?si=At6agoGSLL-H74Xp) 
 *  [Councilor Shane Matthews, Ward 3](https://youtu.be/Ze1AofFMYfk?si=2LEvPRXtAYaPx8Y6) 
 *  [Councilor Deanna Gwyn, Ward 4](https://youtu.be/al1gjgpmwZU?si=aDu0qQem1PjEAtgZ) 
 *  [Councilor Irvin M. Brown, Ward 5](https://youtu.be/CrR1l80V0LE?si=n_6Jg350sjRoJOcp) 
 * Ward 6, vacant

 Find Your Ward  **  

 ![map pin salem oregon](images/4d0fd0bdc1e3673b198b8fd1e7eac9dc7a91da38f4d4ffaf7c0b9700c75e3857.jpg) Use this [interactive map](https://www.cityofsalem.net/government/city-council-mayor/about-city-council/find-a-ward-map) to find wards and neighborhood associations in Salem.

Learn how [ward boundaries were redrawn](https://www.cityofsalem.net/government/shaping-salem-s-future/reports-studies/redraw-ward-boundaries) as a result of the 2020 census.
